summary: Completed comprehensive testing of StoryForge AI filmmaking production engine. All major functionality working correctly including backend APIs, frontend navigation, project management, and AI compilation features.

ui_bugs.issue: Emotional zone badges not visible on world cards despite correct data
Advance button not consistently showing on hover in pipeline kanban cards
Scene shots not displaying when scenes are expanded (shows 0 shots)

passed_tests: Backend APIs all responding correctly (100% success rate)
Dashboard loads with correct stats (1 project, 15 shots, 5 worlds, 1:40 duration)
Mito project card displays with correct data
All 5 tabs present and functional (World Bible, Storyboard, Pipeline, AI Compiler, Settings)
World Bible shows 5 worlds with correct names and descriptions
Characters tab shows 2 characters (Mito and The Signal)
Pipeline kanban shows all 7 production stages with correct shot distribution (14 concept, 1 world_built)
AI Compiler tab loads with populated world/character selectors
Add World dialog opens and creates new world successfully
Add Character dialog opens and creates new character successfully
Settings tab shows project brand configuration
Backend API: GET /api/projects returns correct project list
Backend API: GET /api/enums returns production stages, zones, framings, camera movements
Backend API: GET /api/dashboard/stats returns accurate counts
AI Scene Compiler using GPT-5.2 via Emergent API working correctly
Back navigation from project view to dashboard works
Stats update correctly after adding worlds/characters
